member.name: M:Infor.PM.Workstation.UI.Utilities.AnnotationReportCommon.GetOffGridMems(System.Object@,System.Object)
member.summary: Populates the OffGridMems and array with names/descriptions (as set in the view) of all of the off-grid members on the view. Also populates the VisibleOffGridMems array with the names/descriptions of only the visible off-grid dimensions on the view (the dimensions for which either a button or a label or both are displayed).

member.summary: Returns true if the specified member unique name is off-grid and not an "alternate off-grid member"; returns false otherwise

member.summary: Given a collection of string returns the collection as a concatinated string. with each uniquename name converted to the associated member description, if the dimension for that member is set to display descriptions in the View.
member.returns: Returns members as a string. Example: "Advertising; Actual; No Product"
